title: Hybrid e-Learning Improvement Program for Strengthening Healthcare Workforce Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic healthcare terminology and work processes
context.additional_context: Microlearning via mobile devices (smartphones/tablets) in BYOD environments, requiring intuitive UI/UX design considering learners' age groups

learning_goals: Learners can write lab reports using an assignment submission system with over 90% accuracy.
Learners can achieve an 85%+ quiz response rate through formative assessments.
Learners can perform at least three rounds of peer-to-peer interactive feedback using feedback tools.
Learners can participate in and share opinions on two or more public health-related topics in discussion forums.
Learners can explore and save five or more job-related materials using an external resource linking feature.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
